name: Stub Magazine
description: Read an extract Issue 1 of Stub Magazine - 52 pages of alternative stories, poetry, essays and ephemera from writers new and old. This issue takes us from Iraq, to the bottom of the ocean, to a swine flu infected petting zoo and a multitude of places between. Featuring work by - Adam Biles, Changming Yuan, J J Steinfeld, Joseph Reich, Simon John Cox, P A Levy, Adam Gilmour, Stephen R Williams, R J Slais, Matthew C Golding and reprints of works by Henry Bursill and William Hazlitt.

name: Tape Club Records Limited Editions
description:
Through a drawn out process of blackmail and intimidation, we've got hold of these fantastic Limited Edition Tape Club Records releases at The Ersatz Press Shop.

Only 200 copies of 'At Your Table' and 100 of 'Beat Rotter' and 'Get Well Soon' were ever printed.

Stocks are excee-ee-eedingly limited...

TAPCLB001 (Tape Cassette)
Please Will - At Your Table
A SIDE
1 .. Pink Socks
2 .. He's Here
3 .. Switchmode
4 .. Rescue
B SIDE
5 .. Warmer
6 .. Experiment
7 .. Sack Race
8 .. Hope

TAPCLB009 (CD)
1 .. Beat Rotter (Please Will vs. Rolo Tomassi)
2 .. Wolfgang Bang (Please Will vs. Mirror! Mirror!)

TAPCLB011 (Tape Cassette)
A SIDE .. James Moss - Get Well Soon
B SIDE .. James Moss - Where the Old Grapevine

Select which release you want using the drop down menu.

name: 'Random Play' Compilation CD & Book
description:
Our first not for profit release - a spankingly fantastic 19 track CD compilation of unsigned bands from the south.

Includes a lovely 16 page booklet of wit and wise comment from local music journalists.

Track Listing -  

1. album1 - Please Will (Tape Club Records)
2. Death of a Tin God - Munroe Effect (Function Records)
3. Barons (Demo) - Brenda
4. Held Up By Invisible String - Kumiss
5. So Where Shall I Start - James Moss (Tape Club Records)
6. He's Here - Please Will feat. Hugo Dowlen (Tape Club Records)
7. It's There - Andrew Foster
8. I Wish You Would (Pirate Edit) - Mr James Bright (Tape Club Records)
9. Collage8 - Rude_NHS
10. 3 Party - Jayetal
11. Your Favourite Jacket - Kumiss
12. Hollow - The Confederate Dead
13. 7up (Live) - Jayetal
14. Scenesters - Kill Kasper
15. Sunglows - Peter Lyons (Tape Club Records)
16. If Only - the boy I used to be.
17. Like The Flowing River - Andrew Foster
18. Summer Theme - Thos Henley (Tape Club Records)
19. Black Flower - The Confederate Dead
